title: William Oddity

properties.name: description
properties.value: William Oddity is a bird-watcher and author most well known for his field guide William Oddity's Guide to the Avian. A copy of Oddity's guide is found during the Eagles' Peak quest.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:William Oddity

William Oddity is a bird-watcher and author most well known for his field guide William Oddity's Guide to the Avian. A copy of Oddity's guide is found during the Eagles' Peak quest.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • His name is a reference to Bill Oddie, a famous English ornithologist, writer and comedian.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''William Oddity''' is a bird-watcher and author most well known for his field guide [[Bird book|William Oddity's Guide to the Avian]]. A copy of Oddity's guide is found during the [[Eagles' Peak]] quest.

==Trivia==
*His name is a reference to {{wp|Bill Oddie}}, a famous English ornithologist, writer and comedian.

[[Category:Characters that do not appear in-game]]
